Here is to be a lesson for all ministers who wish to fill the place Christ would have them fill. The minister of the gospel is to keep his hearer's attention to the fact he is a witness crying in the wilderness, "Behold the Lamb of God." He was the True Light.--Ms. 228, 1902. ("Bible Writers Inspired, Not Extinguished," cir. 1902). 


                                    -348-
